summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2123, for the improvement of McClellan Street from Rainier Avenue to 30th Avenue South all in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same, and providing for the necessary surface drainage, under Ordinance No. 21217 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
